description:
Are you an Entrepreneur, Business Owner, or Hustler?

Is there a difference? Does it matter? The answer to both questions is YES. There is a difference. Not knowing that difference can mean the difference between Great Success or Great Failure for your business.

Did you know the actions you are taking right now could be hurting your business and turning away customers and investors? These 3 distinct but similar forms of habits and thinking if not understood can destroy an existing business or prevent a new one from ever launching.

The most successful entrepreneurs are aware of the 3 mentalities and know when and how to use them to grow their businesses.

In this course I will teach you how to do exactly that. You will learn how the entrepreneur, business owner and hustler thinks and acts differently from one another. We will discuss the pros and cons of each and when is the best time to use them and why.

You will also learn how it's possible for you to be a business owner and not be an entrepreneur, why many great business ideas are never launched, how a good habit used incorrectly can destroy your business and much more.

I've also included an assessment to help you determine if you have what it takes to be a successful entrepreneur. This will save you time, money, headaches and frustration. Based on your assessment results and what you decide to do after we review them, I will answer the question: Now that I know where do I go?

For the new entrepreneur I provide solutions to the three most common situations:

  1. I don't have an idea, but I want to start a business.
  2. I have an idea for a business. How do I start?
  3. I have a business. Now what do I do next?

For the person who is not ready to start their own business, but still wants to share in benefits of the entrepreneurial spirit, I show you how to do it and explain each method.

This course and all the courses I produce are designed to help you succeed as an entrepreneur. It's packed with real life examples, worksheets, quick reminders and mini-quizzes to help reinforce the lessons. As an added bonus I'll teach you my Proven Success Formula that has taken me over 25 years to develop. This simple, yet, powerful formula shows you the most important factors that impacts your success or be the cause of your failure. It explains how very talented people can end up poor and how less talented people can rise to the top of their industry. I've also included a bonus lesson to teach you how to use the downloadable form.

In this course you will learn:

  • The impact that each mentality can have on your business.
  • How each mentality impacts customer perception.
  • If you have what it takes to be a successful entrepreneur.
  • As a bonus, a proven success formula that took me over 25 years to develop.
  • What to do if you are truly serious about being a more successful entrepreneur.


What is required to get the most out of this course:

  • No prior skills, experience, expertise or even a business idea necessary.
  • All videos are important! Watch every lesson.
  • Take the assessment you'll be surprised what you learn.
  • Have a Willingness to Learn, a Desire to Improve, and a Passion to Succeed.


Simply watch, listen, learn, and laugh as you discover and have fun at becoming a more successful entrepreneur! Get started today!
title: Are you an Entrepreneur, Business Owner or Hustler?
